attributes.action: posthumously promote Warrant Officer Class One Darren Chant to Captain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Warrant Officer Class One Darren “Daz” Chant was, apparently, shot dead (in Afghanistan) on the day he was to be promoted to Captain in the British Army. 

Particularly, since it occurred so close to Remembrance Sunday, I believe that this promotion should be honoured posthumously.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact the MOD with your suggestion as the petitions website may not be the appropriate channel.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
